text: In 56 % , 78 % and 60 % of the birds the cloacal swabs resulted positive on days 2 , 4 and 6 pi , respectively ( Additional file 1 ) , while all of the birds shed virus RNA via the trachea at each sampling time . We compared the average Ct values of cloacal and tracheal swabs and observed that the virus load in the trachea was significantly higher than in the cloaca , on days 2 and 4 pi .
